entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who no longer meets Harry's eyes. This suggests that Dumbledore may be aware of or concerned about Harry's connection to Voldemort.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as having vivid green eyes, which are compared to Voldemort's red eyes. He is also worried that he might be carrying a 'deadly germ' of Voldemort's influence.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist and is described as having a snakelike face. Harry is concerned about being influenced by Voldemort's dark magic.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Professor Quirrell is mentioned as someone whose head was taken over by Voldemort in the past.

relationships.description: Harry feels that he has been influenced by Voldemort's dark magic and is worried about carrying a 'deadly germ' of it.
Dumbledore seems to be concerned or aware of Harry's connection to Voldemort, which is why he no longer meets Harry's eyes.
Voldemort took over Professor Quirrell's head in the past, suggesting a relationship of possession or control between Voldemort and Quirrell.
Harry identifies with Voldemort to some extent, as he wonders what it would feel like if Voldemort burst out of his skull.
